description: Creates a copy of the incoming message and sets the properties either to a static value or a value from the referenced message.

properties.name: properties
properties.label: Properties
properties.description: Provide the properties to set from the referenced message.

tablefields.name: name
tablefields.label: Name
tablefields.description: Provide the name of the property.

tablefields.name: value
tablefields.label: Value
tablefields.description: Provide the value to set for the property. Either enter a static value or use {propertyname} to use a property value of the referenced message. To set the current time in milliseconds, use [time]. Further tags can be used: [routername], [appname], [flowname]. Specify [null] to delete the property.
